speech: It was nice chatting with you👍,#greetingsname.given-name. I understand you better now🤔. Let me recommend you a perfect restaurant for you. Describe a restaurant experience that you like to have today.  You can be as detailed as you like.

#greetingsname.given-name, I hope we have a nice conversation👍. I felt like I know you better now🤔. What is a restaurant experience that you want to enjoy today? I want to hear from you. You can be as detailed as you like.

I believe I understand you better now👍, #greetingsname.given-name. Let me recommend you 🤔a perfect restaurant for you. Do you have a restaurant experience that you want to enjoy today? Tell me. You can be as detailed as you like.
